short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Designed to provide students with organizational tools and efficient navigation across pages
short.es: Diseñado para proporcionar a los estudiantes herramientas de organización y una navegación eficiente entre páginas
short.fi: Suunniteltu tarjoamaan opiskelijoille järjestelytyökaluja ja tehokasta navigointia sivujen välillä
short.ko: 학생들에게 조직 도구와 페이지 간 효율적인 탐색을 제공하도록 설계되었습니다
short.pt_BR: Projetado para dar aos alunos ferramentas de organização e uma navegação eficiente entre páginas da web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is meant to boost the users efficiency and organization in school, but could also be used for daily tasks. In the extensions home page the user will find 3 buttons and a settings menu. The buttons provide access to the 3 features of StudyDash: To-Do list, Navigation and Notes. The To-Do list serves as a place where users will add their daily tasks and be able to check them out when completed, and remove them when they no longer need it. The navigation tab serves as a menu which can open new tabs with websites which are used in schools such as: Google Drive, Canva, Khan academy, and more! The final feature is the notes. It open a little block where the user can type notes in the extension instead of having to open a separate tab or document while reading or performing a task. Finally in the home page, the user can access the settings menu, where they will encounter two themes for the extension, as well as a button to close all tabs in case they need to use it. In conclusion,  this extension will help user organize themselves and finish work faster.
